generated_text:
- road: The paved surface with white lane markings where vehicles are driving.
- sidewalk: The paved area with curbs and poles on the left side, designated for pedestrians.
- building: The white building with green shutters and signage on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: The trees and bushes visible along the sidewalk and in the background.
- terrain: The grassy area visible behind the sidewalk and trees.
- person: The individual walking on the sidewalk in the middle distance.
- car: The white car on the left and the black car on the right.
- pole: The vertical poles along the sidewalk and the traffic sign poles.
- traffic sign: The circular traffic sign on the left and the rectangular traffic sign in the middle distance.
- wall: The low wall with potted plants on the left side of the sidewalk.
